weekly picks (May 3 week 2024)

Posted on May 20, 2024 in 2024may,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2024 May 3rd week collection

  1. PhysRevLett.132.210401 Robust Spectral \pi Pairing in the Random-Field Floquet Quantum Ising Model (PRL)

  2. 82 Informing Potential Remedies for Quasiparticle Poisoning (Physics)

  3. 2405.11854 Unveiling the Impact of Sulfur Doping on Copper-Substituted Lead Apatite: A Theoretical Study (arXiv)

  4. 2405.11260 Geometric Superfluid Weight of Composite Bands (arXiv)

  5. 2405.11187 Evaluation of Doppler shifts in d-wave superconductor tunneling junctions (arXiv)

  6. 2405.12178 Topological superconductivity in Fibonacci quasicrystals (arXiv)

  7. 2405.12141 Giant Impurity Effects on Charge Loop Current Order States in Kagome Metals (arXiv)

  8. 2405.11445 The Influence of Extended Interactions on Spin Dynamics in One-dimensional Cuprates (arXiv)

  9. 2405.12196 YASTN: Yet another symmetric tensor networks; A Python library for abelian symmetric tensor network calculations (arXiv)

  10. 2405.11833 Determination of the Neel vector in rutile altermagnets through x-ray magnetic circular dichroism: the case of MnF2 (arXiv)

  11. 2405.11420 Generic Approach to Intrinsic Magnetic Second-order Topological Insulators via Inverted p-d Orbitals (arXiv)

  12. 2405.11378 Complex magnetic landscape in kagome metal TbTi3Bi4 and competition with family of Ln2-xTi6+xBi9 (Ln: Tb-Lu) shurikagome metals (arXiv)

  13. 2405.11979 Non-equilibrium orbital edge magnetization (arXiv)

  14. 2405.11892 Emergence of giant orbital Hall and tunable spin Hall effects in centrosymmetric TMDs (arXiv)

  15. 2405.11249 Interlayer Coupling Induced Topological Phase Transition to Higher Order (arXiv)

  16. 2405.10656 \phi Josephson junction induced by altermagnetism (arXiv)

  17. 2405.10583 Large Fermi surface in pristine kagome metal CsV3Sb5 and enhanced quasiparticle effective masses (arXiv)

  18. 2405.10794 Inverse magnetocaloric effect and phase separation induced by giant van Hove singularity in itinerant ferromagnetic metal (arXiv)

  19. 2405.10731 Chiral bosonic quantum spin liquid in the integer-spin Heisenberg-Kitaev model (arXiv)

  20. 2405.10899 Witnessing Entanglement and Quantum Correlations in Condensed Matter: A Review (arXiv)

  21. 2405.10807 Anomalous Seebeck effect and counter-propagating ballistic currents in graphene (arXiv)

  22. 2405.10326 Giant Linear Dichroism Controlled by Magnetic Field in FePS3 (arXiv)

  23. 2405.10819 Skyrmions in synthetic antiferromagnet nanorings for electrical signal generation (arXiv)

  24. 2405.10816 Strain-induced activation of chiral-phonon emission in monolayer WS2 (arXiv)

  25. 2405.10753 Topological spin-torque diode effect in skyrmion-based magnetic tunnel junctions (arXiv)

  26. 2405.10571 Stability and dynamics of magnetic skyrmions in FM/AFM heterostructures (arXiv)
